feed.title: glazeruns TikTok
feed.subtitle: OK Boomer, all the latest TikToks from glazeruns

entry.title: Badwater 135 taught me a lot about failure. I was in the best shape of my life, but my electrolyte plan didn't work, and I found out very quickly what happens when my body shuts down. Uncontrolled whole-body cramps for 2 hours were one of the most painful
entry.content: Badwater 135 taught me a lot about failure. I was in the best shape of my life, but my electrolyte plan didn't work, and I found out very quickly what happens when my body shuts down. Uncontrolled whole-body cramps for 2 hours were one of the most painful

entry.title: Is this a write off? still not sponsored #runtok #ultrarunner
entry.content: Is this a write off? still not sponsored #runtok #ultrarunner

entry.title: Lions and Tigers and Bears, oh no. I'm off to see the wizard. Still haven't decided on bear spray, but I did buy a small air horn. Everyone keeps saying no brown bears in the Crazy Mountains. Only black bears. But mountain lions scare me. My wife is going
entry.content: Lions and Tigers and Bears, oh no. I'm off to see the wizard. Still haven't decided on bear spray, but I did buy a small air horn. Everyone keeps saying no brown bears in the Crazy Mountains. Only black bears. But mountain lions scare me. My wife is going

entry.title: Pulled off the win although I had to really work for it. 100 miles/161 km does not come easily. Especially when the race starts at 6pm. Born to Run 100 miler was an incredible experience and I will be back. #runtok #ultramarathon #ultrarunner #borntorun
entry.content: Pulled off the win although I had to really work for it. 100 miles/161 km does not come easily. Especially when the race starts at 6pm. Born to Run 100 miler was an incredible experience and I will be back. #runtok #ultramarathon #ultrarunner #borntorun
